episode_event_ch0296_40_nanjamo_battle/4:
Your eyeballs are MINE—caught in my Electroweb!
Whosawhatsit? Iono!

Ladies aaand gentlemens! ’Ello, ’ello, hola!
Ciao and bonjour! It’s time for the Iono Zone!

Today’s the day you’ve all been waiting for!
Pasio’s Midnight Parade is in full swing!

Woo! The city’s buzzin’ with excitement, and
everybody’s dressed to the nines in their snazziest
outfits!

Oh, oh! By the bysies, do y’all know the magic
words we use durin’ the Midnight Parade?

That phrase kicks off a Pokémon battle—one that
packs a tricksy punch! If you lose, say buh-bye to
your sweets! Real law-of-the-jungle stuff!
And! So! I’m calling my next live stream...

“No Escape! Battle and Plunder! Fight or Fright
in Kooky-Chic Costumes!”

A whole buncha snazzily-dressed Trainers—yours
truly included!—are gonna battle and battle and
battle some more...

And whoever walks away with the most sweets in
the end is the WINNER!

All righty! Drum roll, please! Give a big, wild
welcome to our fancy-schmancy participants!
Whoa! Look! You seein’ these fantabulous outfits?!

All riiight! Here we go! Time to get the
battle started!

All you fashionable folks in your dazzling duds—
gimme a battle that’ll electrify all my viewer pals!

Aaaand YOU, my loyal fans—I need to hear you
cheerin’! Gimme all you got!
